headline: PNC Q4 Deep Dive: Loan Growth, M&A, and Technology Investment Drive Momentum
summary: Financial services giant PNC (NYSE:PNC) fell short of the markets revenue expectations in Q4 CY2025, but sales rose 6% year on year to $5.93 billion. Its non-GAAP profit of $4.88 per share was 15.4% above analystsâ€™ consensus estimates.
